title: Instagram VA – AI/Tech Carousels + Video
job_overview:
To apply, you must fill out this form:
Upgrade to see actual info

We’re looking for a reliable and creative virtual assistant to help run a fast-growing Instagram account focused on AI and tech (155K+ followers). You'll help create engaging carousel posts—some with short videos—and keep things organized in our system.

Your tasks will include:

Finding trending AI/tech news, tools, or stories

Designing 4–5 carousel posts per week using Canva

Adding short videos or animations to some carousels

Writing clear and engaging captions

Scheduling approved posts using Meta Business Suite or Buffer

Tracking ideas and progress in Airtable

Bonus if you:

Have basic video editing skills (adding text, cropping, trimming, etc.)

Can create short video-based posts or reels occasionally

Ideal candidate:

Strong Canva skills (carousel design especially)

Comfortable working with short videos

Clean, natural English writing

Understands Instagram formatting and trends

Interested in AI, tech, and new tools

Organized, detail-oriented, and consistent with deadlines
